attributes.additional_details: Stop it now as its draining family incomes we work to survive we pay our bills and rent shopping and that's our money gone then we have the council tax so we get into debt as we can't afford it so we rob peter to pay paul then we get deeper into debt so when you don't pay the council takes us to court and put the amount up so then they send bullies out so please abolish it as we have no money left
attributes.background: Stop it now as its draining family incomes we work to survive we pay our bills and rent shopping and that's our money gone then we have the council tax so we get into debt as we can't afford
